attributes.action: Recommend Nat Lofthouse For His Deserved Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nat Lofthouse played only for Bolton Wanderers and England. From 31 starts for England he scored 30 goals and earned the title "The Lion of Vienna".
Always a 'gentle' ambassador for football, his home town and his country, Mr Lofthouse at 80 years of age should not be overlooked, particularly when many footballers with lesser real achievements than he, have recived recognition.
Make him Sir Nat.
